text: (off screen voice) Captain.
Yes, sir?
(V.O) Tell them we wish to board at once.
Yes, sir.
(cont'd) With all due respect for the Trade Federation, the Ambassodors for the Supreme Chancellor wish to board immediately.
Yes, yes, of course...ahhh...as you know, our blockade is perfectly legal, and we'd be happy to receive the Ambassador...Happy to.
They must be important if the Viceroy sent one of those useless protocol gearheads to greet them.
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - DOCKING BAY - SPACE

text: I'm TC-14 at your service. This way, please.
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - DOCKING BAY - SPACE

text: A Republic cruiser! That's trouble...don't you think?
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - DOCKING BAY - SPACE

text: I'm not made to think.
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - DOCKING BAY - SPACE

text: I hope you honoured sirs with the most comfortable here. My master will be with you shortly.
I have a bad feeling about this.
I don't sense anything.
It's not about the mission, Master, it's something...elsewhere...elusive.
Don't center on your anxiety, Obi-Wan. Keep your concentration here and now where it belongs.
Master Yoda says I should be mindful of the future...
.....but not at the expense of the moment. Be mindful of the living Force, my young Padawan.
Yes, Master...how do you think the trade viceroy will deal with the chancellor's demands?
These Federation types are cowards. The negotiations will be short.
(shaken) What?!? What did you say?
The Ambassadors are Jedi Knights, I believe.
I knew it! They were sent to force a settlement, eh. Blind me, we're done for!
They must be dead by now. Blast, what's left of them.
What in blazes is going on down there?
Have you ever encountered a Jedi Knight before, sir?
Well, not exactly, but I don't...(panicked) Seal off the bridge.
That won't be enough, sir.
I want destroyer droids up here at once!!!
We will not survive this.
Close the blast doors!!!
...They're still coming through!
Impossible!! This is impossible!!
Where are those destroyer droids?!
Destroyer droids!
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - HALLWAY - OUTSIDE BRIDGE

text: Offhand, I'd say this mission is past the negotiation stage.
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - HALLWAY - OUTSIDE BRIDGE

text: Switch to bio...There they are!
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - HALLWAY - OUTSIDE BRIDGE

text: They have shield generators!
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - HALLWAY - OUTSIDE BRIDGE

text: It's a standoff! Let's go!
where: INT. FEDERATION BATTLESHIP - HALLWAY - OUTSIDE BRIDGE

text: We have them on the run, sir...they're no match for destroyer droids.
Sir, they've gone up the ventilation shaft.
Battle droids.
It's an invisible army.
It's an odd play for the Trade Federation. We've got to warn the Naboo and contact Chancellor Valorum. Let's split up. Stow aboard separate ships and meet down on the planet.
You were right about one thing, Master. The negotiations were short.
Sir, a transmission from the planet.
It's Queen Amidala herself.
At last we're getting results.
(cont'd) Again you come before me, Your highness. The Federation is pleased.
You will not be pleased when you hear what I have to say, Viceroy...Your trade boycott of our planet has ended.
I was not aware of such a failure.
I have word that the Senate is finally voting on this blockade of yours.
I take it you know the outcome. I wonder why they bother to vote.
Enough of this pretense, Viceroy! I'm aware the Chancellor's Ambassadors are with you now, and that you have been commanded to reach a settlement.
I know nothing about any Ambassadors...you must be mistaken.
Beware, Viceroy....the Federation is going too far this time.
Your Highness, we would never do anything without the approval of the Senate. You assume too much.
We will see.
She's right, the Senate will never....
It's too late now.
Do you think she suspects an attack?
I don't know, but we must move quickly to disrupt all communications down there.
...How could that be true? I have assurances from the Chancellor...his Ambassaodrs did arrive. It must be the...get...negotiate...
Senator Palpatine?!? (turns to Panaka) What's happening?
Check the transmission generators...
A malfunction?
It could be the Federation jamming us. Your Highness.
A communications disruption can only mean one thing. Invasion.
Don't jump to conclusions, Governor. The Federation would not dare go that far.
The Senate would revoke their trade franchise, and they'd be finished.
We must continue to rely on negotiation.
Negotiation? We've lost all communications!...and where are the Chancellors Ambassadors? How can we negotiate? We must prepare to defend ourselves.
This is a dangerous situation, Your Highness. Our security volunteers will be no match against a battle-hardened Federation army.
I will not condone a course of action that will lead us to war.
...and there is no trace of the Jedi. They may have gotton onto one of your landing craft.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP / GRASS PLAINS - TWILIGHT (FX)

text: If they are down here, sir, we'll find them. We are moving out of the swamp and are marching on the cities. We are meeting no resistance.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP / GRASS PLAINS - TWILIGHT (FX)

text: Excellent.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP / GRASS PLAINS - TWILIGHT (FX)

text: Oh, noooooooooo!
(Cont'd) Hey, help me! Help me!!
Let go!
Oyi, mooie-mooie! I luv yous!
Are you brainless? You almost got us killed!
I spake.
The ability to speak does not make you intelligent. Now get outta here!
No...no! Mesa stay...Mesa yous humble servaunt.
That wont be necessary.
Oh boot tis! Tis demunded byda guds. Tis a live debett, tis. Mesa culled Jaja Binkss.
I have no time for this now...
Say what?
(cont'd) Oh, nooooo! Weesa ganna....
Stay down!
...dieeee!
Sorry, Master, the water fried my weapon.
You forgot to turn your power off again, didn't you?
(cont'd) It won't take long to recharge, but this is a lesson I hope you've learned, my young Padawan.
Yes, Master.
Yousa sav-ed my again, hey?
What's this?
A local. Let's go, before more of those droids show up.
Mure? Mure did you spake??!?
(cont'd) Ex-squeeze me, but da moto grande safe place would be Otoh Gunga. Tis where I grew up...Tis safe city.
A city! (JAR JAR nods his head) Can you take us there?
Ahhh, will...on second taut...no, not willy.
No??!
Iss embarrissing, boot... My afrai my've bean banished. My forgoten der Bosses would do terrible tings to my. Terrible tings if my goen back dare.
You hear that?
(cont'd) That's the sound of a thousand terrible things heading this way...
When they find us, they will crush us, grind us into little pieces, then blast us into oblivion!
Oh! Yousa point is well seen. Dis way! Hurry!
Much farther?
Wesa goen underwater, okeyday?
(cont'd) My warning yous. Gungans no liken outlaunders. Don't expict a wern welcome.
Don't worry, this has not been our day for warm welcomes.
Heyo-dalee, Cap'n Tarpals, Mesa back!
Noah gain, Jar Jar. Yousa goen tada Bosses. Yousa in big dudu this time.
How wude.
Yousa cannot bees hair. Dis army of mackineeks up dare tis new weesong!
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: That droid army is about to attack the Naboo. We must warn them.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Wesa no like da Naboo! Un dey no like uss-ens. Da Naboo tink day so smarty den us-ens. Day tink day brains so big.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: After those droids take control of the surface, they will come here and take control of you.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: No, mesa no tink so. Mesa scant talkie witda Naboo, and no nutten talkie it outlaunders. Dos mackineeks no comen here! Dey not know of uss-en.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: You and the Naboo form a symbiont circle. What happens to noe of you will affect the other. You must understand this.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Wesa wish no nutten in yousa tings, outlaunder, and wesa no care-n about da Naboo.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: (waves his hand) Then speed us on our way.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Wesa gonna speed yousaway.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: We need a transport.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Wesa give yousa una bongo. Da speedest way tooda Naboo tis goen through da core. Now go.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Thank you for your help. We go in peace.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Master, whats a bongo?
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: A transport, I hope.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Daza setten yous up. Goen through da planet core is bad bombin!!
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Thank you, my friend.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Ahhh...any hep hair would be hot.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: We are short of time, Master.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: We'll need a navigator to get us through the planet's core. This Gungan my be of help.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: (cont'd) What is to become of Jar Jar Binks here?
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Binkss brokeen the nocombackie law. Hisen to be pune-ished.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: He has been a great help to us. I hope the punishment will not be too severe.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Pounded unto death.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: (grimacing) Oooooh...Ouch!
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: We need a navigator to get us through the planet's core. I have saved Jar Jar Binks' life. He owes me what you call a "life.debt."
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Binks. Yousa havena liveplay with thisen hisen?
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Your gods demand that his life belongs to me now.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Hisen live tis yos, outlauder. Begone wit him.
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Count mesa outta dis! Better dead here, den deader in da core...Yee guds, whata mesa sayin?!
where: INT. OTOH GUNGA - HIGH TOWER BOARD ROOM

text: Dis is nusen.
Master, why do you keep dragging these pathetic life forms along with us?...Here, take over.
Hey, ho? Where wesa goen??
You're the navigator.
Yo dreamen mesa hopen...,br *QUI-GON
Ooooh, maxibig..."da Force"...Wellen, dat smells stinkowiff.
Why were you banished, Jar Jar?
Tis a long tale, buta small part wawdabe mesa...ooooh...aaaa.....clumsy.
They banished you because you're clumsy?
Mesa cause-ed mabee one or duey lettal bitty axadentes...yud-say boom da gasser, un crash Der Bosses heyblibber...den banished.
Full speed ahead.
Oooops.
Give me the controls.
Wesa free!
There's always a bigger fish.
The invasion is on schedule, My Lord.
Good. I have the Senate bogged down in procedures. By the time this incident comes up for a vote, they will have no choice but to accept your control of the system.
The Queen has great faith the Senate will side with her.
Queen Amidala is yound and naive. You will find controlling her will not be difficult. You have done well, Viceroy.
Thank you, My Lord.
You didn't tell him about the missing Jedi?
No need to report that to him, until we have something to report.
.....we're losing power.
Stay calm. We're not in trouble yet.
What yet? Monstairs out dare! Leak'n in here, all'n sink'n, and nooooo power! You nutsen! WHEN YOUSA TINK WESA IN TROUBLE?!!!?
Power's back.
Monstairs back!
(cont'd) Wesa in trouble now??
Relax.
You overdid it.
(cont'd) This is not good!
Wesa dead yet?? Oie Boie!
Head for that outcropping.
Ah, victory!
Wesa dude it!
Wesa safe now.
Get this thing started.
Dissen berry good. Hey?
What is it?
What!!?? Oie boie!
(cont'd) Iyiiyi, wesa die'n here, hey!
Come on...
(cont'd) Come on, Jar Jar.
No! Too scary!
Get up here!
No a mighty no!
(cont'd) Oie boie...mesa comen. Mesa comen!
That was close.
(O.S) Drop your weapons!
I said drop your weapons
Whoa!!!
...how will you explain this invasion to the Senate?
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: The Naboo and the Federation will forge a treaty that will legitimize our occupation here. I've been assured it will be ratified by the Senate.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I will not co-operate.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Now, now, your Highness. You are not going to like what we have in store for your people. In time, their suffering will persuade you to see our point of view. Commander. (OOM-9 steps forward) Process them.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Yes, sir! (turns to his sergeant) Take them to Camp Four.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Yousa guys bombad!
Your Highness, we are the Ambassadors, for the Supreme Chancellor.
Your negotiations seem to have failed, Ambassador.
The negotiations never took place. Your Highness, we must make contact with the republic.
They've knocked out all our communications.
Do you have transports?
In the main hanger. This way.
There are too many of them.
That won't be a problem. (to Amidala) Your Highness, under the circumstances, Isuggest you come to Coruscant with us.
Thank you, Ambassador, but my place is here with my people.
They will kill you if you stay.
They wouldn't dare.
They need her to sign a treaty to make this invasion of theirs legal. They can't afford to kill her.
The situation here is not what it seems. There is something else behind all this, Your Highness. There is no logic in the Federation's move here. My feelings tell me they will destroy you.
Please, Your Highness, reconsider. Our only hope is for the Senate to side with us... Senator Palpatine will need your help.
Getting past their blockade is impossible, Your Highness. Any attempt to escape will be dangerous.
Your Highness, I will stay here and do what I can...They will have to retain the Council of Governors in order to maintain control. But you must leave...
Either choice presents a great risk...to all of us...
We are brave, Your Highness.
If you are to leave, Your Highness, it must be now.
Then, I will plead our case before the Senate. (to Bibble) Be careful, Governor.
We need to free those pilots.
I'll take care of that. OBI-WAN heads toward the group of captured pilots.
Where are you going?
I'm Ambassador for the Supreme Chancellor, and I'm taking those people to Coruscant.
You're under arrest!
....our communications are still jammed.
Now stay here, and keep out of trouble.
Ello, boyos. (no response) Disa wanna longo trip...hey?
(Cont'd) Tis opens?...Oooops! Many springs and things come flying out.
(Cont'd) Yoi! Just yoken!
Powers back! That little droid did it. He bypassed the main power drive. Deflector shield up, at maximum.
There's not enough power to get us to Coruscant...the hyperdrive is leaking.
We'll have to land somewhere to refuel and repair the ship.
Here, Master. Tatooine... It's small, out of the way, poor... The Trade Federation has no presence there.
How can you be sure?
It's controlled by the Hutts...
The Hutts??
It's risky...but there's no alternative.
You can't take Her Royal Highness there! The Hutts are gangsters... If they discovered her...
...It would be no different than if we landed on a system controlled by the Federation...except the Hutts aren't looking for her, which gives us an advantage.
We control all the cities in the North and are searching for any other settlements...
Destroy all high-ranking officials, Viceroy...slowly...quietly. And Queen Amidala, has she signed the treaty?
She has disappeared, My Lord. One Naboo cruiser got pat the blockade.
Viceroy, find her! I want that treaty signed.
My Lord, it's impossible to locate the ship. It's out of our range.
...not for a Sith...
(Cont'd) ...Viceroy, this is my apprentice. Lord Maul. He will find your lost ship.
Yes, My Lord. The hologram fades off.
(Cont'd) This is getting out of hand...now there are two of them.
We should not have made this bargain. What will happen when the Jedi become aware of these Sith Lords?
...An extremely well put together little droid. Without a doubt, it saved the ship, as well as our lives.
It is to be commended...what is its number?
R2-D2, Your Highness.
Thank you, ARTOO Detoo. You have proven to be very loyal...Padme
(Cont'd) Clean this droid up the best you can. It deserves our gratitude...(to Panaka) Continue, Captain.

Yor Highness, we are heading for a remote planet called Tatooine. It is a system far beyond the reach of the Trade Federation. There we will be able to make needed repairs, then travel on to Coruscant.
Your Highness, Tatooine is very dangerous. It's controlled by an alliance of gangs called the Hutts. I do not agree with the Jedi on this.
You must trust my judgement, Your Highness.
Hidoe!
(Cont'd) Sorry, nomeanen to scare yousa.
That's all right.
I scovered oily back dare. Needen it?
Thank you. This little guy is quite a mess.
Mesa Ja Ja Binksss... *PADME

Me no know...mesa day starten pitty okeyday witda brisky morning munchen. Den boom....getten berry skeered, un grabbed dat Jedi, and before mesa knowen it...pow! Mesa here. (he shrugs)...getten berry berry skeered.
Tahyt's it. Tatooine.
There's a settlement...a spaceport, looks like.
Land near the outskirts. We don't want to attract any attention.
Obi-Wan, sire, pleeese, no mesa go!
Sorry, Qui-Gon's right. You'll make things less obvious.
(Cant'd) The Hyperdrive generator is gone. We will need a new one.
Don't let them send ant transmissions. Be wary...I sense a disturbance in the Force.
I fell it also, Master.
Dis sun doen murder tada skin.
Wait!
(Cont'd) Her Highness commands you to take her handmaiden with you. She wishes for her to observe the local...
No more commands from Her Highness today, Captain. This spaceport is not going to be pleasant...
The Queen wishes it. She is curious about this planet.
I've been trained in defense... I can take care of myself.
Don't make me go back and tell her you refuse.
I don't have time to argue. But this is not a good idea. Stay close to me.
...moisture farms for the most part, but also a few indigenous tribes and scavengers. The few spaceports like this one are havens for those who do not wish to be found...
....like us. JAR JAR is in a constant state of panic.
Dissen berry berry bad. (steps in ooze) Ooooh...icky...icky...goo.
We'll try one of the smaller dealers.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - JUNK DEALER PLAZA - DAY

text: (subtitled) Hi chuba da naga? (What do you want?)
I need parts for a J-type 327 Nubian.
Ah yes, ah yes. Nubian. We have lots of that. What kinda junk? (subtitled) Peedenkel! Naba dee unko (Boy, get in here! Now!)
My droid here has a readout of what I need.
(subtitled) Coona tee-tocky malia? (What took you so long?)
(subtitled) Mel tassa cho-passa... (I was cleaning the bin like you...)

(subtitled) Chut-Chut! Ganda doe wallya. (Never mind! Watch the store) Me dwana no bata. (I've got some selling to do here.) (to Gui-Gon) Soooo, let me take- a thee out back. Ni you'll find what you need.
Don't touch anything.
Are you an angel?
What?

An angel. I've heard the deep space pilots talk about them. They live on the Moons of Iego I thimk. They are the most beautiful creatures in the universe. They are good and kind, and so pretty they make even the most hardened spice pirate cry.
I've never heard of angels.
You must be one...maybe you just don't know it.
You're a funny little boy. How do you know so much?
Since I was very little, three, I think. My Mom and I were sold to Gardulla the Hutt, but she lost us, betting on the Podraces, to Watto, who's a lot better master than Gardulla, I think.
You're...a slave?
I am a person! My name is Anakin.
I'm sorry. I don't fully understand. (looking around)This is a strange world to me.
You are a strange girl to me.
(Cont'd) Hit the nose!

...Here it is...a T-14 hyperdrive generator!! Thee in luck, I'm the only one hereabouts who has one...but thee might as well buy a new ship. It would be cheaper, I think...Sying of which, how's thee going to pay for all this?
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: I have 20,000 Republic dataries.
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: Republic credits?!? Republic credits are no good out here. I need something more real...
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: I don't have anything else. (raising his hand) But credits will do fine.
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: No they won'ta. QUI-GON, using his mind power, waves his hand again.
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: Credits will do fine.
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: No, they won'ta. What you think you're some kinda Jedi, waving your hand around like that? I'm a Toydarian. Mind tricks don'ta work on me-only money. No money, no parts! No deal! And no one else has a T-14 hyperdrive, I promise you that.
where: EXT. WATTO'S JUNK YARD - BEHIND SHOP - DAY

text: ...wouldn't have lasted long if I weren't so good at fixing things. I'm making my own droid...
We're leaving.
I'm glad I met you,....ah...
...Anakin.
Anakin.
Anakin Skywalker.
Padme Naberrie.
I'm glad I met you too.
(subtitled) Ootmians! Tinka me chasa hopoe ma booty na nolia. (Outlanders! They think because we live so far from the center, we don't know nothing.)
(subtitled) La lova num botaffa. (They seemed nice to me.)
(subtitled) Fweepa niaga. Tolpa da bunky dunko. (Clean the racks, then you can go home.)
...Obi-Wan, you're sure there isn't anything of value left on board?
(V.O) A few containers of supplies, the Queen's wardrobe, maybe. Not enough for you to barter with. Not in the ammounts you're talking about.
All right. Another solution will present itself. I'll check back.
Noah gain...da beings hereabouts cawazy. Wesa be robbed un crunched.
Not likely. We have nothing of value, that's our problem.
Hey, that will be seven truguts!!
(subtitled) Chuba!! (You!!)
Who, mesa??
(subtitled) Ni chuba na?? (Is this yours??)
(to himself) Why mesa always da one??
(V.O) Because you're afraid.
(subtitled) Chess ko, Sebulba...Coo wolpa tooney rana. (Careful, Sebulba...This one's very connected.)
(subtitled) Tooney rana nu pratta dunko, shag. (Connected?? Whada you mean, slave?)
(subtitled) Oh da Hutt...cha porko ootman geesa...me teesa rodda co pana pee choppa chawa. (As in Hutt...big time outlander, this one... I'd hate to see you diced before we race again.)

(subtitled) Neek me chowa, wermo, mo killee ma klounkee(Next time we race, wermo, it will be the end of you!) Una noto wo shag, me wompity du pom pom. (If you weren't a slave, I'd squash you right now.)
(subtitled) Eh, chee bana do mullee ra. (Yeah, it'd be a pity if you had to pay for me.)
(Cont'd) Hi! Your buddy here was about to be turned into orange goo. He picked a fight with a Dug. An especially dangerous Dug called Sebulba.
Nosir, nosir. Mesa hate crunchen. Dat's da last ting mesa wanten.
Nevertheless, the boy is right...you were heading for trouble. Thank you, my young friend.
Mesa doen nutten!
Fear attracts the fearful. He was trying to overcome his fear by squashing you...be less afraid.
And that works for you.
To a point. (he smiles)
This storm's going to slow them down.
It looks pretty bad. We'd better seal the ship.
(Cont'd) Yes?
We'll be right there.
How are you feeling today, Jira?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: The heat's never been kind to me, you know, Annie!
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Guess what? I've found that cooling unit I've been searching for. It's pretty beat up, but I'll have it fixed up for you in no time, I promise.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: You're a fine boy, Annie.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: I'll take four pallies today. (to Padme) You'll like these...
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Whoops, I thought I had more...Make thgat three, I'm not hungry.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Gracious, my bones are aching...storm's coming on, Annie. You'd better get home quick.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: (to QUI-GON) Do you have shelter?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: We'll hed back to our ship.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Is it far?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: On the outskirts.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: You'll never reach the outskirts in time...sandstorms are very, very dangerous. Come with me. Hurry!
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Mom! Mom! I'm home.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Dissen cozy.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Oh, my!! Annie, what's this?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: These are my friends, Mom. This is Padme, and...gee, I don't know any of your names.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: I'm Qui-Gon Jinn, and this is Jar Jar Binks.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: ...and our droid, ARTOO-Detoo.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: I'm building a droid. You wanna see?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Anakin! Why are they here?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: A sandstorm, Mom. Listen.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Your son was kind enough to offer us shelter.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Come on! Let me show you Threepio!
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: I have enough food for a meal.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Oh, tank you. Thank you so much. I'm sorry if I was abrupt. I'll never get used to Anakin's surprises.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: He's a very special boy. SHMI looks at him as if he's discovered a secret.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Yes, I know.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Isn't he great?! He's not finished yet.
He's wonderful!
You reall like him? He's a protocol droid...to help Mom. Watch!
How do you do, I am See-Threepio, Human Cyborg Relations. How might I serve you?
He's perfect.
When the storm is over, you can see my racer. I'm building a Podracer!
I beg your pardon....what do you mean I'm naked?
(Cont'd) My parts are showing? Oh, my goodness. How embarrassing!

...cut off all food supplies until you return...the death toll is catastrophic...we must bow to their wishes, Your Highness...Please tell us what to do! If you can hear us, Your Highness, you must contact me...
It's a trick. Send no reply... Send no transmission of any kind.
...the Queen is upset...but absolutly no reply was sent.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: It sounds like bait to establish a connection trace.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: What if it is true and the people are dying?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Either way, we're running out of time.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Tatooine is sparsely populated. If the trace was correct I will find them quickly, Master.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - BALCONY OVERLOOKING CITY - NIGHT

text: Move against the Jedi first...you will then have no difficulty taking the Queen back to Naboo, where she will sign the treaty.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - BALCONY OVERLOOKING CITY - NIGHT

text: At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - BALCONY OVERLOOKING CITY - NIGHT

text: You have been well trained, my young apprentice, they will be no match for you. It is too late for them to stop us now. Everything is going as planned. The Republic will soon be in my command.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - BALCONY OVERLOOKING CITY - NIGHT

text: All slaves have transmitters placed inside their bodies somewhere.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I've been working on a scanner to try and locate them, but no luck.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Any attempt to escape...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: ...and they blow you up...poof!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: How wude.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I can't believe there is still slavery in the galaxy. The Republic's anti-slavery laws...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: The Republic doesn't exist out here...we must survive on our own.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Have you ever seen a Podrace?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: They have Podracing on Malastare. Very fast, very dangerous.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I'm the only human who can do it.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Mom, what? I'm not bragging. It's true. Watto says he's never heard of a human doing it.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: You must have Jedi reflexes if you race Pods.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Don't do that again.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I...I was wondering...something...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: What?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Well, ahhh...you're a Jedi Knight, aren't you?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: What makes you think that?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I saw your laser sword. Only Jedi carry that kind of weapon.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Perhaps I killed a Jedi and stole it from him.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I don't think so... No one can kill a Jedi Knight.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I wish that were so... ANAKIN. I had a dream I was a Jedi. I came back here and freed all the slaves...have you come to free us?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: No, I'm afraid not...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I think you have...why else would you be here?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I can see there's no fooling you...(leans forward) You mustn't let anyone know about us...we're on our way to Coruscant, the central system in the Republic, on a very important mission, and it must be kept secret.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Coruscant...wow...how did you end up here in the outer rim?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Our ship was damaged, and we're stranded here until we can repair it.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I can help! I can fix anything!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I believe you can, but our first job is to aquire the parts we need...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Wit no-nutten mula to trade.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: These junk dealers must have a weakness of some kind.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Gambling. Everything here revolves around betting on those awful races.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Podracing... Greed can be a powerful ally.. if it's used properly.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I've built a racer! It's the fastest ever...There's a big race tomorrow, on Boonta Eve. You could enter my pod. It's all but finished...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Anakin, settle down. Watto won't let you...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Watto doesn't know I've built it. (to Qui-Gon) You could make him think it's your's, and you could get him to let me pilot it for you.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I don't want you to race, Annie...It's awful. I die every time Watto makes you do it.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: But Mom, I love it...and they need help...they're in trouble. The prize money would more than pay for the parts they need.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Wesa ina pitty bad goo.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Your mother's right. Is there anyone friendly to the Republic who might be able to help us?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: We have to help them, Mom...you said that the biggest problem in the universe is no one helps each other...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Anakin, don't...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I'm sure Qui-Gon doesn't want to put your son in danger. We will find another way...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: No, Annie's right, there is no other way... I may not like it, but he can help you...he was meant to help you.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Is that a yes? That is a yes!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Are you sure about this? Trusting our fate to a boy we hardly know. The Queen will not approve.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: The Queen does not need to know.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Well, I don't approve.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Patta go bolla!
No batta!
Pedunky. Maa kee cheelya.
Bayno, Bayno!
The boy tells me you wanta sponser hi insa race. You can't afford parts. How can you do this? Not on Republic credits, I think. (he laughs)
My ship will be the entry fee.
Not bad...not bad...a Nubian.
It's in good order, except for the parts we need.
...but what would the boy ride? He smashed up my Pod in the last race. It will take some time to fix it.
Ahhhh....it wasn't my fault really...Sebulba flashed me with his vent ports. I actually saved the Pod...mostly.
(laughing) That you did. The boy is good, no doubts there.
I have...acquired a Pod in a game of chance. "The fastest ever built."
I hope you didn't kill anyone I know for it. (laughs) So, you supply the Pod and the entry fee; I supply the boy. We split the winnings fifty-fifty, I think.
Fifty-fifty!?! If it's going to be fifty-fifty, I suggest you front the cash for the entry. If we win, you keep all the winnings, minus the cost of the parts I need...If we lose, you keep my ship.
(Cont'd) Either way, you win.
(subtitled) Deal! Yo bana pee ho-tah, meedee ya. (Your friend is a follish one, methinks.)
What if this plan fails, Master? We could be stuck here for a long time.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: (V.O) A ship without a power supply will not get us anywhere, and there is something about this boy...
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: You should be proud of your son. He gives without any thought of reward.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: He knows nothing of greed. He has...
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: He has special powers.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Yes...
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: He can see things before they happen. That's why he appears to have such quick reflexes. It is a Jedi trait.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: He deserves better than a slave's life.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: The Force is unusally strong with him, that much is clear. Who was his father?
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: There was no father, that I know of...I carried him, I gave him birth...I can't explain what happened. Can you help him?
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: I'm afraid not. Had he been born in the Republic, we would have identified him early, and he would have become Jedi, no doubt...he has the way. But it's too late for him now, he's too old.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Padme and Jar Jar, this is my friend Kitster, and seek, Amee and Wald.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Wow, a real Astro Droid...how'd you get so lucky?
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: This isn't the half of it. I'm entered in the Boonta Race tomorrow!
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: What? With this??
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

from: WALD :(subtitled) Annie, Jesko na joka. 9You are such a joke, Annie.)
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

from: AMEE :You've been working on that thing for years. It's never going to run.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

from: SEEK :Come on, let's go play ball. Keep it up, Annie, and you're gonna be bug squash.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Hey! Jar Jar! Stay away from those energy binders...
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Who, mesa?
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: If your hand gets caught in that beam, it will go numb for hours.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Ouch-dats muy bigo Oucho. (Gibberish)
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: But you don't even know if this thing will run.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: It will.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: I think it's time we found out. Use this power charge.
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Yes, sir!!
where: EXT. NABOO SPACECRAFT - TATOOINE DESERT - DAY

text: Sit still, Annie. Let me clean this cut.
There are so many! Do they all have a system of planets?
Most of them.
Has anyone been to them all?
(laughs) Not likely.
I want to be the first one to see them all... Ouch!
There, good as new...
(O.S.) Annie, bedtime!
What are you doing?
Checking your blood for infections.
I've never seen...
(O.S.) Annie! I'm not goiung to tell you again!
Go on, you have a big day tomorrow. (beat) Goodnight.
(Cont'd) Obi-Wan...
Yes, Master.
Make an analysis of this blood sample I'm sending you.
Wait a minute...
I need a midi-chlorian count.
All right. I've got it.
What are your readings?
Something must be wrong with the transmission.
Here's a signal check.
Strange. The transmission seems to be in good order, but the reading's off the chart...over twenty thousand.
(almost to himself) That's it then.
Even Master Yoda doesn't have a midi-chlorian count that high!
No Jedi has.
What does it mean?
I'm not sure.
I hope you're about finished.
You were in my dream...you were leading a huge army into battle.
I hope not; I hate fighting. Your mother wants you to come in and clean up. We have to leave soon.
Hook 'em up, Kitster. (to Padme) I won't be long. Where's Qui-Gon?
He and Jar Jar left already. They're with Watto at the arena.
...I want to see your spaceship the moment the race is over.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Patienc, my blue friend. You'll have your winnings before the suns set, and we'll be far away from here.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Not if your ship belongs to me, I think...I warn you, no funny business.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: You don't think Anakin will win?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Don't get me wrongo. I have great faith in the boy. He's a credit to your race, but Sebulba there is going to win, I think.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Why?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: He always wins. (laughs) I'm betting heavily on Sebulba.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: I'll take that bet.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (suddenly stops laughing) What??!! What do you mean?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: I'll wager my new racing pod against...say...the boy and his mother.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: A Pod for slaves. I don't think so...well, poerhaps. Just one...the mother, maybe...the boy isn't for sale.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: The boy is small, he can't be worth much.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (Cont'd) For the fastest Pod ever built?!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Both, or no bet.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: No Pod's worth two slaves...not by a long shot...one slave or nothing.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: The boy, then...
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: We'll let fate decide. Blue it's the boy, red his mother...
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (Cont'd) You won the small toss, outlander, bou you won't win the race, so...it makes little difference.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (Cont'd) (subtitled) Bonapa keesa pateeso, o wanna meetee chobodd. (Better stop your friends betting, or I'll end up owning him, too.)
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: What did he mean by that?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: I'll tell you later.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Oh my! Space travel sounds rather perilous.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: I can assure you they will never get me onto one of those dreadful starships!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (to Anakin) This is so wizard! I'm sure you'll do it this time, Annie.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Do what?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Finish the race, of course!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: You've never won a race?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Well...not exactly...
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Not even finished?!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: ...but Kitster's right, I will this time.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Of course you will.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Toogi! Toogie! (Greetings) Toong mee cha kulkah du Boonta magi! tah oos azalus ooval Poddraces. (We have perfect weather today for the Boonta classic. The most hazardous of all Podraces.)
That's absolutly right. And a big turnout here, from all corners of the Outer Rim territories. I see the contestants are making their way out onto the starting grid.
La Yma beestoo (Yes, there they are!)
I see Ben Quadinaros from the Tund system.
...eh Gasgano doowa newpa Ord Petrovia! (And Gasgano in thenew Ord Pedrovia.)
Two time winner, Boles Roor...
Poo tula moosta, woe grane champio Sebulba du Pixelito! Splastyleeya bookie ookie!! (On the front line the reigning champion, Sebulba from Pixelito. By far the favorite today.)
And a late entry, Anakin Skywalker, a local boy.
Wampa peedunkee unko ( I hope he has better luck this time.)
I see the flaggers are moving onto the track.
O grandio lust, Jabba Du Hutt, amu intoe tah parena. (His honor, our glorious host, Jabba the Hutt has entered the arena.)
(subtitled) Chowbaso! Tam ka chee Boonta rulee ya, kee madda hodrudda du wundee. (Welcome!) Sebulba tuta Pixelito...
Be safe.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: I will, Mom. I promise.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: ...Mawhonic tuta Hok, Teemto Pagalies tuta Moonus Mandel, Anakin Skywalker tuta Tatoonine....
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: Dis berry loony, Annie. May da guds be kind, mesa palo.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: You carry all our hopes.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: I won't let you down.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: Bazda wahota, shag. Dobiella Nok. Yoka to Bantha poodoo. 9You won't walk away from this one, slave scum! You're Bantha poodoo.)
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: (subtitled) Cha skrundee da pat, sleemo. (Don't count on it, slime-ball.)
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: (sutitled)...Ka bazza kundee hodrudda! (...Let the challenge begin!)
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: Are you all set, Annie? (Anakin nods) Remember,concentrate on the moment. Feel. Don't think. Trust your instincts. (he smiles) May the Force be with you.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: Mesa no watch. Dissen ganna be messy!
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - STARTING GRID - DAY

text: Ya pawa culka doe rundee! (The power couplings are being activated)
Hey, it looks like they're clearing the grid.
Is he nervous?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: He's fine.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: You Jedi are far too reckless. The Queen...
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: The Queen trusts my judgment, young handmaiden. You should too.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: You assume too much.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Start your engines.
An dare ovv! (And they're off!)
Oh...wait. Little Skywalker has stalled.
And there goes Skywalker... He'll be hard pressed to catch up with the leaders today.
Looks like a few Tusken Riaders have campe out on the canyon dune turn.
Where's Skywalker?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - VIEWING PLATFORM - DAY

text: There goes Quadinaros' power couplings.
Sebulba! Ka pa me cheespa wata! (Here comes Sebulba in record time.)
What gooie-on?
Bug off.
He musta crash-ud.
Here he comes!
He has to complete two more circuits? Oh dear!
It looks like Skywalker is moving up through the field. He's in...
Steeth pa nagoola! (Sixth place, not bad.)
Ody Mandrell! Coona wa wunda dunko! (Ody Mandrell into the pits for some attention.)
Droids!

from: B :At the start of the third and final lap, Sebulba is in the lead, closely followed by Skywalker...

text: Skywalker is forced onto the service ramp!
Oh noah!
Amazing... a controlled thrust and he's back on course! What a move!
He's catching Sebulba.
Inkabunga. (Incredible!)
That little human being is out of his mind.
Punda tah punda! (They're neck and neck!)
They're side by side!
Bongo du bongu! (Shoulder to shoulder!)
It's Skywalker! The crowd are going nuts! Oh Ah Oh Ah (rock head in tandem with partner)
You! You swindled me! You knew the boy was going to win! Somehow you knew it! I lost everything.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - PRIVATE BOX - DAY

text: Whenever you gamble, my freind, eventually you'll lose. Bring the parts to the main hanger. I'll come by your shop later so you can release the boy.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - PRIVATE BOX - DAY

text: You can't have him! It wasn't a fair bet!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - PRIVATE BOX - DAY

text: Would you like to discuss it with the Hutts...I'm sure they can settle this.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - PRIVATE BOX - DAY

text: No, no! I want no more of your tricks! Take him!
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - PRIVATE BOX - DAY

text: Ah, gee...enough of this...
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: It's so wonderful, Annie. You have brought hope to those who have none. I'm so very proud of you...
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: We owe you everything.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Just feeling this good was worth it.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Padme. Jar Jar, let's go, we've got to get these parts back to the ship.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: (Cont'd) I'll return the eopies by midday.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Start getting this hyperdrive generator installed. I'm going back...some unfinished business. I won't be long.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: Why do I sense we've picked up another pathetic life form...?
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: It's the boy who's responsible for getting those parts.
where: INT. MOS ESPA - ARENA - MAIN HANGER - DAY

text: What's this?
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: He said I cheated.
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Did you?
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: No!
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Do you still think he cheated?
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Yes.
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Well, Annie. You know the truth... You will have to tolerate his opinion, fighting won't change it.
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

from: WALD :Keep this up, Greedo, and you're gonna come to a bad end.
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: These are yours. We sold the Pod.
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: (suddenly beaming) Yes!
where: EXT. TATOOINE - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Mom, he sold the Pod. Look at all the money we have!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Oh, my goodness, That's wonderful.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: And Anakin has been freed.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: What?!?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: You're no longer a slave.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Did you hear that, Mom? (to Qui-Gon) Was that part of the prize, or what?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Let's just say Watto has learned an important lesson about gambling.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Now you can make your dreams come true, Annie. You're free! (turns to Qui-Gon) Will you take him with you? Is he to become a Jedi?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Our meeting was not a coincidence. Nothing happens by accident. You are strong with the Force, but you may not be accepted by the Coucil.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: A Jedi! Mighty blasters, you mean I get to go with you in your starship and everything?!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Anakin, training to be a Jedi will not be a easy challenge. And if you succeed, it will be a hard life.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: But it's what I want. What I've always dreamed about. Can I go, Mom?!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: This path has been placed for you, Annie; the choice to take it is yours alone.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I want to go.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Then, pack your things. We haven't much time.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Yipee!!
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: (Cont'd) What about Mom? Is she free too? You're coming, aren't you, Mom
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I tried to free your mother, Annie, but Watto wouldn't have it.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: But the money from selling...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: It's not nearly enough.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Son, my place is here. My future is here. It is time for you to let go...to let go of me. I cannot go with you.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I want to stay with you. I don't want things to change.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: You can't stop change any more than you can stop the suns from setting. Listen to your feelings; Annie, you know what's right.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I'm going to miss you so much, Mom...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I love you, Annie...now hurry.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Thank you.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: I will watch after him. You have my word. Will you be all right?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: He was in my life for such a short time.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - MAIN ROOM - DAY

text: Well, Threepio, I'm free...and I'm going away...in a starship...
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - SECOND ROOM - DAY

text: Master, Annie, you are my maker, and I wish you well. Although I'd like it better if I were a little less naked.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - SECOND ROOM - DAY

text: I'm sorry I wasn't able to finish you, Threepio...give you coverings and all... I'm going to miss working on you. You've been a great pal. I'll make sure Mom doesn't sell you or anything. Bye.
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - SECOND ROOM - DAY

text: Sell me?!?
where: INT. ANAKIN'S HOVEL - SECOND ROOM - DAY

text: There are so many of us who want you to stay, Annie... You're a hero.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I... (looks to SHMI) I... have to go.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Well.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Well.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Thank's for every moment you've been here. You're my best friend.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I won't forget.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: (starting to cry) I can't do it, Mom. I just can't.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Annie, remember when you climbed the great dune in order to chase the Banthas away so they wouldn't be shot... Remember how you collapses several times, exhausted thinking you couldn't do it?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: (Cont'd) This is one of those times when you have to do something you don't think you can do. I know how strong you are, Annie. I know you can do this...
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Will I ever see you again?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: What does your heart tell you?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I hope so...yes...I guess.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: Then we will see each other again.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I.. will become a Jedi and I will come back and free you, Mom...I promise.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: No matter where you are, my love will be with you. Now be brave, and don't look back... don't look back.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I love you so much.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - SLAVE QUARTERS - DAY

text: I've been freed, and I'm going away. Buy yourself a cooling unit with this... Otherwise I'll worry about you.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Can I give you a hug
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Sure.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: I'll miss you, Annie.. there isn't a kinder boy in the galaxy. You be careful...
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: What is it?
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Probe droid. Very unusual... not like anything I've seen before. Come on.
where: EXT. MOS ESPA - STREET - FRUIT STAND - DAY

text: Master Qui-Gon,sir, wait!
where: EXT. TATOOINE - DESERT - NABOO SPACECRAFT - DAY

text: Anakin, drop!
where: EXT. TATOOINE - DESERT - NABOO SPACECRAFT - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Annie, get to the ship! Take off! Go! Go!
where: EXT. TATOOINE - DESERT - NABOO SPACECRAFT - DAY

text: Qui-Gon's in trouble. He says to take off...now!!
Who are you?
He's a friend.
Qui-Gon is in trouble, he says to take off!
I don't see anything.
Over there! Fly low!
Are you all right?
I think so... that was a surpirse I wont soon forget.
What was it?
I don't know... but he was well trained in the Jedi arts. My guess is he was after the Queen...
Do you think he'll follow us?
We'll be safe enough once we're in hyperspace, but I have no doubt he knows our destination.
What are we going to do about it?
We will be patient. Anakin Skywalker, meet Obi-Wan Kenobi.
Pleased to meet you. Wow! You're a Jedi too?
Let's hope this hyperdrive works and Watto didn't get the last laugh.
When are you going to give up this pointless strike? Your Queen is lost, your people are starving, and you, Governor, are going to die, much sooner than your people, I'm afraid. Take him away!
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: This invasion will gain you nothing. We're a democracy. The people have decided... They will not live under your tyranny.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: My troops are in position to begin searching the swamps for these rumored underwater villages... they will not stay hidden for long.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Are you all right?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: It's very cold.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: You're from a warm planet, Annie. Too warm for my taste. Space is cold.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: You seem sad.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: The Queen is...worried. Her people are suffering...dying. She must convince the Senate to intervene, or...I'm not sure what will happen.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: I'm...I'm not sure what's going to happen to me. I dunno if I'll ever see you again.. (he pulls something from his pocket) I made this for you. Sou you'd remember me. I carved it out of a japor snippet... It will bring you good fortune.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: It's beautiful, but I don't need this to remember you. Many things will change when we reach the capital, Annie. My caring for you will always remain.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: I care for you too. Only I...miss...
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: ...You miss your mother.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Coruscant...the capital of the Republic...the entire planet is one big city.
Wow! It's so huge!
It is a great gift to see you alive, Your Majesty. May I present Supreme Chancellor Valorum.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Welcome, Your Highness. It is an honor to finally meet you in person. I must relay to you how distressed everyone is over the currant situation. I've called for a special session of the Senate to hear your position.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: I am grateful for your concern, Chancellor.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: There is a question of precedure, but I feel confident we can overcome it...
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Da Queens- a bein grossly nice, mesa tinks. (he looks around) Pitty hot!
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: I must speak with the Jei Council immediately, Your Honor. The situation has become more complicated.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT - SENATE LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Dissen all pitty odd to my.
Don't look at me. I don't know what's going on.

...the Republic is not what it once was. The Senate is full of greedy, squabbling delegates who are only looking out for themselves and their home sytems. There is no interest in the common good...no civility, only politics...its disgusting. I must be frank, Your Majesty, there is little chance the Senate will act on the invasion.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: Chancellor Valorum seems to think there is hope.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: If I may say so, Your Majesty, the Chancellor has little real power...he is mired down by baseless accusations of corruption. A manufactured scandal surrounds him. The bureaucrats are in charge now.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: What options do we have?
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: Our best choice would be to push for the election of a stronger Supreme Chancellor. One who will take control of the bureaucrats, enforces the laws, and give us justice. You could call for a vote of no confidence in Chancellor Valorum.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: He has been our strongest supporter. Is there any other way?
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: Our only other choice would to be to submit a plea to the courts...
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: There's no time for that. The courts take even longer to decide things than the Senate. Our people are dying, Senator...more and more each day. We must do something quickly to stop the Federation.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: To be realistic, Your Highness, I'd say we're going to have to accept Federation control for the time being.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: There is something I cannot do.
where: INT. PALPATINE'S QUARTERS - LIVING AREA - DAY

text: ...my only conclusion can be that it was a Sith Lord.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: A Sith Lord?!?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Impossible! The Sith have been extinct for a millenium.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: The very Republic is threatened, if involved the Sith are.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: I do not believe they could have returned without us knowing.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Hard to see, the dark side is. Discover who this assassin is, we must.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: I sense he will reveal himself again.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: This attack was with purpose, that is clear, and I agree the Queen is the target.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: With this Naboo queen you must stay, Qui-Gon. Protect her.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: We will use all our resources here to unravel this mystery and discover the identity of your attacker... May the Force be with you.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: May the Force be with you.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Master Qui-Gon more to say have you?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: With your permission, my Master. I have encountered a vergence in the Force.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: A vergence, you say?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Located around a person?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: A boy... his cells have the highest concentration of midi-chlorians I have seen in a life form. It is possible he was conceived by the midi-chlorians.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: You're referring to the prophesy of the one who will bring balance to the Force...you believe it's this boy??
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: I don't pressume...
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: But you do! Rrevealed your opinion is.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: I request the boy be tested.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Trained as a Jedi, you request for him?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Finding him was the will of the Force...I have no doubt of that. There is too much happening here...
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Bring him before us, then.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: Tested he will be.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - DAY

text: May I help you, son?
I'm...I'm looking for the handmaiden, Padme.
The boy is here to see Padme.
Send him in.
I'd like to speak with Padme, if I could.
I'm sorry, Annie. Padme is not here right now.
(O.S.) Who is it?
Anakin Skywalker, to see Padme, Your Highness.
I've sent Padme on an errand.
I'm going to the Jedi temple to start my training, I hope.
(Cont'd) I may not see her again...and... I just wanted to say goodbye.
We will tell her for you. We're sure her heart goes with you.
Thank you, Your Highness. I'm sorry to have disturbed you.
If the Federation moves to defer the motion...Your Majesty, Ibeg of you to ask for a resolution to end this congressional session.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: I wish I had your confidence in this, Senator.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: You must force a new election for Supreme Chancellor...I promise you there are many who will support us...it is our best chance... Your Majesty, our only, chance.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: You truely believe Chancellor Valorum will not bring our motion to a vote?
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: He is distracted...he is afraid. He will be of no help.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The Chair recognizes the Senator from the sovereign system of Naboo.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Supreme Chancellor, delegates of the Senate. A tragedy has occured on our peaceful system of Naboo. We have become caugt in a dispute you're all well aware of, which began right here with the taxation of trade routes, and has now engulfed our entire planet in the oppresion of the Trade Federation.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: This is outrageous! I object to the Senator's statements!
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The Chair does not recognize the Senator from the Trade Federation at this time. Please return to your station.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: To state our allegations, I present Queen Amidala, the recently elected ruler of Naboo, to speak on our behalf.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Honorable representatives of the Republic, distinguished delegates, and Your Honor Supreme Chancellor Valorum, I come to you under the gravest of circumstances. The Naboo system has been invaded by force. Invaded...against all the laws of the Republic by the Droid Armies of the Trade...
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: I object! There is no proof. This is incredible. We recommend a commision be sent to Naboo to assertain the truth.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Overruled.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Your Honor, you cannot allow us to be condemned without reasonable observation. It's against all the rules of procedure.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The Congress of Malastare concurs with the honorable delegate from the Trade Federation. A commision must be appointed...that is the law.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The point...
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Enter the bureaucrats, the true rulers of the Republic, and on the payroll of the Trade Federation, I might add. This is where Chancellor Valorum's strength will dissapear.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The point is conceded...Section 523A take precedence here. Queen Amidala of the Naboo, will you defer your motion to allow a commission to explore the validity of your accusations?
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: (angrily) I will not defer...I have come before you to resolve this attack on our sovereignty now. I was not elected to watch my people suffer and die while you discuss this invasion in a committee. If this body is not capable of action, I suggest new leadership is needed. I move for a "vote of no confidence"...in Chancellor Valorum's leadership.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: What?...No!
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Order! We shall have order...
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Alderaan seconds the motion for a vote of no confidence in Chancellor Valorum.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The motion has been seconded by Bail Organa of Alderaan.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: There must be no delays. The motion is on the floor and must be voted upon in this session.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The Trade Federation moves the motion be sent to the procedures committee for study.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Vote now! Vote now! Vote now!
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: You see, Your Majaesty, the tide is with us...Valorum will be voted out, I assure you, and they will elect in a new Chancellor, a strong Chancellor, one who will not let our tragedy continue...
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Thew Supreme Chancellor requests a recess. Tomorrow we will begin the vote.
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: Palpatine, I thought you were my ally...my friend. You have betrayed me! How could you do this?
where: INT. MAIN ROTUNDA - GALACTIC SENATE - DAY

text: The boy will not pass the Council's tests, Master, and you know it. He is far too old.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: Anakin will become A Jedi...I promise you.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: Don't defy the Council, Master..not again.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: I will do what I must.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: Master, you could be sitting on the Council by now if you would just follow the code. They will not go along with you this time.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: You still have much to learn, my young apprentice.
where: EXT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - BALCONY - SUNSET

text: A ship...a cup...a speeder.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Good, good, young one. How feel you?
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Cold, sir.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Afraid are you?
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: No, sir.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Afraid to give up your life?
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: I don't think so.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: See through you, we can.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Be mindful of your feelings...
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: YOur thoughts dwell on your mother.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: I miss her.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Afraid to lose her..I think.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: (a little angry) What's that got to do with anything?
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Eveything. Fear is the path to the dark side... fear leads to anger... anger leads to hate.. hate leads to suffering.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: (angrily) I am not afraid!
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: A Jedi must have the deepest commitment, the most serious mind. I sense much fear in you.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: (quietly) I am not afraid.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Then continue, we will.
where: INT. PALACE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - SUNSET

text: Mesa wonder why da guds invent pain?
To motivate us, I imagine...
Yousa tinken yousa people ganna die?
I don't know.
Gungans ganna get pasted too, eh?
I hope not.
Gungans do die'n without a fight.... wesa warriors. Wesa gotta grand army. Dat why you no liken us, metinks.
Your Highness, Senator Palpatine has been nominated to succeed Valorum as Supreme Chancellor.

A surprise, to be sure, but a welcome one. I promise, Your Majesty, if I am elected, I will bring democracy back to the Republic. I will put an end to corruption. The Trade Fedreation will lose its influence over the bureaucrats, and our people will be freed.
Who else can be nominated?
Bail Antilles of Alderaan and Ainlee Teem of Malastare.
I feel confident...our "situation" will create a strong sympaphy vote for us... I will be Chancellor, I promise you.
I fear by the time you have control of the bureaucrats, Senator, there will be nothing left of our cities, our people, our way of life...
I understand your concern, Your Majesty; unfortunately, the Federation has possession of our planet. The law is in their favor.
With the Senate in transition, there is nothing more I can do here...Senator, this is your arena. I feel I must return to mine. I have decided to go back to Naboo. My place is with my people.
Go back!! But, Your Majesty, be realistic! You would be in danger. They will force you to sign the treaty.
I will sign no treaty, Senator. My fate will be no different from that of our people. Captain!
Yes, Your Highness?
Ready my ship!
Please, Your Majesty, stay here...where it's safe.

No place is safe, if the Senate doesn't condemn this invasion. It is clear to me now that the Republic no longer functions as a democracy. If you win the election, Senator, I know you will do everything possible to stop the Federation. I pray you will bring sanity and compassion back to the Senate.
...Correct you were, Qui-Gon.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: His cells contain a high concentration of midi-chlorians.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: The Force is strong with him.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: He's to be trained, then.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: No. He will not be trained.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT
INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: He is too old. There is already too much anger in him.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: He is the chosen one...you must see it.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Clouded, this boy's future is. Masked by his youth.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: I will trin him, then. I take Anakin as my Padawan learner.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: An apprentice, you have, Qui-Gon. Impossible, to take on a second.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: We forbid it.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Obi-Wan is ready...
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Iam ready to face the trials.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Ready so early, are you? What know you of ready?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Headstrong....and he has much to learn about the living Force, but he is capabe. There is little more he will learn from me.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Our own council we will keep on who is ready. More to learn, he has...
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Now is not the time for this...the Senate is voting for a new Supreme Chancellor. Queen Amidala is returning home, which will put pressure on the Federation, and could widen the confrontation.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: And draw out the Queen's attacker.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Events are moving fast...too fast.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Go with the Queen to Naboo and discover the identity of the dark warrior. That is the clue we need to unravel this mystery of the Sith.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Young Skywalker's fate will be decided later.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: I brought Anakin here; he must stay in my charge. He has nowhere else to go.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: He is your ward, Qui-Gon...we will not dispute that.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Train him not. Take him with you, but train him not!
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Protect the Queen, but do not intercede if it comes to war until we have the Senate's approval.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: May the Force be with you.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: It is not disrespect, Master, it is the truth.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: From your point of view....
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: The boy is dangerous...they all sense it. Why can't you?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: His fate is uncertain, not dangerous. The Council will decide Anakin's future...that should be enough for you. Now get on board!
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Master Qui-Gon, sir, I do not wish to be a problem.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: You won't be, Annie....I'm not allowed to train you, so I want you to watch me and be mindful...always remember, your focus determines your reality. Stay close to me and you will be safe.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Master, sir...I've been wondering...what are midi-chlorians?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Midi-chlorians are a microcopic lifeform that reside within all living cells and communicates with the Force.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: They live inside of me?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: In your cells. We are symbionts with the midi-chlorians.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Symbionts?
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Life forms living together for mutual advantage. Without the midi-chlorians, life could not exist, and we would have no knowledge of the Force. They continually speak to you, telling you the will of the Force.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: They do??
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: When you learn to quiet your mind, you will hear them speaking to you.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: I don't understand.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: With time and training, Annie...you will.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: (Cont'd) Your Highness, it is our pleasure to continue to serve and protect you.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT
