text: I welcome your help. Senator Palpatine fears the Federation means to destroy me.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: I promise you, I will not let that happen.
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: Wesa goen home!
where: INT. TEMPLE OF THE JEDI - COUNCIL CHAMBERS - TWILIGHT

text: The Queen is on her way to you. I regret she is of no further use to us. When she gets there, destroy her.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Yes, my Lord.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Viceroy, is the planet secure?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Yes, my Lord, we have taken over the last pockets of primitive life forms. We are in complete control of the planet now.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Good. I will see to it that in the Senate, things stay as they are. I am sending Darth Maul to join you. He will deal with the Jedi.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: Yes, my Lord.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: A Sith lord here with us?!!
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - THEED - NIGHT

text: ...and that one?
The forward stabalizer.
And those control the pitch?
You catch on pretty quick.
The moment we land the Federation will arrest you, and force you to sign the treaty.
I agree...I'm not sure what you hope to accomplish by this.
I'm going to take back what's ours.
There are only twelve of us, Your Highness....we have no army.
I cannot fight a war for you, Your Highness, only protect you.
Jar Jar Binks!
Mesa, Your Highness?
Yes. I need your help.
The blockade's gone.
The war's over...No need for it now.
I have one battleship on my scope.
A droid control ship.
They've probably spotted us.
We haven't much time.
Hi! Where have you been?
Annie! What are you doing here?
I'm with Qui-Gon...but...they're not going to let me be a Jedi. I'm too old.
This is going to be dangerous, Annie.
Is it? I can help... Where are we going?
To war, I'm afraid. The Queen has had to make the most difficuld decision of her life. She doesn't believe in fighting, Annie. We are a peaceful people...
I want to help...I'm glad you're back.
Jar Jar is on his way to the Gungan city, Master.
Good.
Do you think the Queen's idea will work?
The Gungans will not easily be swayed, and we cannot use our power to help her.
I'm...I'm sorry for my behavior, Master. It is not my place to disagree with you about the boy. I am grateful you think I am ready for the trials.
You have been a good apprentice. You are much wiser than Iam, Obi-Wan. I foresee you will become a great Jedi Knight.
Ello! Where das everybody?
Dare-sa nobody dare. All gone. Some kinda fight, I tink. Sorry, no Gungas...no Gungas.
Do you think they have been taken to camps?
More likely they were wiped out.
No...mesa no tink so. Gungan hiden. When in trouble, go to sacred place. Mackineeks no find them dare.
Do you know where they are?
Dissen it.
(Cont'd) Heyo-dalee, Captain Tarpals.
Binks!! Noah gain!
We comen to see da boss.
Ouch time, Binks... Ouch time for all-n youse.
Jar Jar, yousa payen dis time. Who's da uss-en others??
I am Queen Amidala of the Naboo...I come before you in peace.
Naboo biggen. Yousa bringen da Mackineeks... Dya busten uss-enomm. Yousa all bombad. Yousa all die'n, mesa tink.
We wish to form an alliance...
Your Honor...
Whosa dis?
I am Queen Amidala (points to Queen) This is my decoy...my protection...my loyal bodyguard.

(Cont'd) ...I am sorry for my deception, but under the circumstances it has become necessary to protect myself. Although we do not always agree, Your Honor, our two great societies have always lived in peace...until now. The Trade Federation has destroyed all that we have worked so hard to build. You are in hiding, my people are in camps. If we do not act quickly, all will be lost forever...I ask you to help us...no, I beg you to help us.
(Cont'd) We are your humble servants...our fate is in your hands.
Yousa no tinken yousa greater den da Gungans.. Mesa like dis. Maybe wesa bein friends.
...we've sent out patrols. We've already located their starship in the swamp....It won't be long, My Lord.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: This is an unexpected move for her. It's too aggresive.. Lord Maul, be mindful.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Yes, my Master.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Be patient... Let them make the first move.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Daza comen!
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: All right. They're here!
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: Yousa doen grand. Jar Jar bringen da Naboo together.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: Oh, no, no, no...
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: So, wesa maken yousa Bombad General.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: General??! Oh, no..
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: What is the situation?
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: Almost everyone's in camps. A few hundred police and guards have formed an underground movement. I brought as many of the keaders as I could. The Federation Army's also much larger than we thought, and much stronger. Your Highness, this is a battle I do not think we can win.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: The battle is a diversion. The Gungans must draw theDroid Army away from the cities. We can enter the city using the secret passages on the waterfall side. Once we get to the main entrance, Captain Pnaka will create a diversion, so that we can enter the palace and capture the Viceroy. Without the Viceroy, they will be lost and confused.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: (Cont'd) What do you think, Master Jedi?
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: The Viceroy will be well guarded.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: The difficulty's getting into the throne room. Once we're inside, we shouldn't have a problem.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: There is a possibility with this diversion many Gungans will be killed.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: Wesa ready to do are-sa part.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: We have a plan which should immobilize the Droid Army. We will send what pilots we have to knock out the Droid control ship which is orbiting the planet. If we can get past their rayshields, we can sever communication and their droids will be helpless.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: A well-conceived plan. However, there's great risk. The weapons on your fighters may not penetrate the shields on the control ship.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: And there's an even bigger danger. If the Vicroy escapes, Your Highness, he will return with another droid army.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: That is why we must not fail to get to the Viceroy. Everything depends on it.
where: EXT. NABOO EDGE OF SWAMP/ GRASS PLAINS - DAY

text: ...she is more foolish than I thought.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: We are sending all available troops to meet this army of hers assembling near the swamp. It appears to be made up of primitives. We do not expect much resistance.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I am increasing security at all Naboo detention camps.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I feel there is more to this, My Master. The two Jedi may be using the Queen for their own purposes.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: The Jedi cannot become involved. They can only protect the Queen. Even Qui-Gon Jinn will not break that conenant.... This will work to our advantage...
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I have your approval to proceed then, My Lord.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Proceed. Wipe them put...all of them.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Energize the shields.
Once we get inside, Annie, you find a safe placeto hide and stay there.
Sure.
And stay there!
I thought the battle was going to take place far from here...this is too close!
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: What is going on?
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I told you there was more to this...the Jedi are involved.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Get to your ships!
Better find a new hiding place, kid. I'm taking this ship.
My guess is the Viceroy is in the throne room.
I agree.
Hey! Wait for me.
No, Annie, you stay there. Stay right where you are.
But, I...
Stay in that cockpit.
(Cont'd) We'' handle this...
Oh, no...
(Cont'd) We gotta do something, ARTOO.
(Cont'd) All right, thanks ARTOO! Great idea! I'll take over. Let's see...
(Cont'd) Where's the trigger? Oops, wrong one.. Maybe this one....
(Cont'd) Yeah, all right. "Droid blaster." Yeah!
(Cont'd) Oops...shield up! Always on the right...shields always on the right.
(Cont'd) I know we're moving. I'll shut the energy drive down.
(Cont'd) Oops!! Wrong one.
(Cont'd) I'm not doing anything!
(Cont'd) I know...I didn't push anything.
Bravo Flight A, take on the fighters. Flight B, make the run on the transmitter.
Roger, Bravo Leader.
Enemy fighters straight ahead!
The Autopilot is searching for what other ships?
(Cont'd) There is no manual override, ARTOO. You'll have to rewire it or something.
(cont'd) Look! There they are! That's where the autopilot is taking us.
We don't have time for this, Captain.
Let's try the outside stairway.
Retreat! Retreat!
Whoo, boy! This is tense!
(Cont'd)
(Cont'd) I've got control?
(Cont'd) Okay, let's go left!
(Cont'd) Yes...I've got control. You did it, ARTOO!
(Cont'd) Go back!?! Qui-Gon told me to stay in this cockpit and that's what I'm gonna do. Now c'mon!
(Cont'd) Oops! Whoa!
(Cont'd) I'll try spinning, that's a good trick.
(Cont'd) I know we're in trouble! Hang on! The way out of this mess is the way we got into it.
(Cont'd) Which one? This one?
Bravo flight...go for the central bridge.
ROger, Bravo Leader.
Their deflector shield is too strong. We'll never get through it.
I know, ARTOO! This isn't Podracing!
(Cont'd) We're hit!
(Cont'd) Great gobs of bantha poo-doo!
(Cont'd) I'm trying to stop! I'm trying to stop! Whoa!
(Cont'd) All right! All right! Get the system started!
(Cont'd) Everything's overheated. All the lights are red.
Throw down your weapons. They win this round.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - HALLWAY TO THRONE ROOM

text: But we can't....
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - HALLWAY TO THRONE ROOM

text: Captain, I said throw down your weapons.
where: INT. THEED - PALACE - HALLWAY TO THRONE ROOM

text: Dissa bad, berry bombad.
Mesa hopen dissa working for da Queen.
Your little insurrection is at an end, Your Highness. Time for you to sign the treaty...and end this pointless debate in the Senate.
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: I will not be signing any treaty, Viceroy, because you've lost!
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: After her! This one is a decoy!
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: (Cont'd) Your Queen will not get away with this.
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Now, Viceroy, this is the end of your occupation here.
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Don't be absurd. There are too few of you. It won't be long before hundreds of destroyer droids break in to rescue us.
where: INT. THED - PALACE THRONE ROOM - DAY

text: Master! Master!
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: It is too late...It's...
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: No!
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: Obi-Wan promise...promise me you'll train the boy...
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: Yes, Master...
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: He is the chosen one...he will...bring balance...train him!
where: INT. THEED - POWER GENERATOR - MELTING PIT

text: Uh oh. This is not good.
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) The systems are still overheated, ARTOO.
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: Where's your pilot?
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) You're the pilot?
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) Let me see your identification!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: Yes...we have ignition.
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (seeing Anakin) You! Come out of there or we'll blast you!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: Not if I can help it! Shields up!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) This should stop them.
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) ...and take this!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) Darn...I missed!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) Let's get out of here!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: (Cont'd) Now, this is Podracing! Whoopee!
where: INT. NABOO STARFIGHTER - COCKPIT - FEDERATION HANGER

text: Sir, we're losing power... There is some problem with the main reactor...
Impossible!! I don't...
What's that?? It's blowing up from the inside.
I don't know, we didn't hit it.
Look! One of ours! Outta the main hold!!
Wierdind...
He flew into the hold, behind the deflector shield and blasted the main reactor...
Amazing... They don't teach that in the academy.
We're all accounted for. Who flew that ship?
I'm not going to get into trouble, am I?
Now, Viceroy, you are going to have to go back to the Senate and explain all this.
I think you can kiss your Trade franchise goodbye.
Congratulations on youer election, Chancellor. It is so good to see you again.
It's good to be home. Your boldness has saved our people, Your Majesty. It is you who should be congratulated. Together we shall bring peace and prosperity to the Republic.
Confer on you, the level of Jedi Knight the Coucil does. But agree on you taking this boy as your Padawan learner, I do not.
where: INT. TURRET ROOM - NABOO PALACE - LATE DAY

text: Qui-Gon believed in him. I believe in Qui-Gon.
where: INT. TURRET ROOM - NABOO PALACE - LATE DAY

text: The Chosen One the boy may be; nevertheless, grave danger I fear in his training.
where: INT. TURRET ROOM - NABOO PALACE - LATE DAY

text: Master Yoda, Igave Qui-Gon my word. I will train Anakin. Without the approval of the Council if I must.
where: INT. TURRET ROOM - NABOO PALACE - LATE DAY

text: Qui-Gon's defiance I sense in you. Need that, you do not. Agree, the council does. Your apprentice, young Skywalker will be.
where: INT. TURRET ROOM - NABOO PALACE - LATE DAY

text: He is one with the Force, Anakin...You must let go.
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET

text: What will happen to me now?
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET

text: I am your Master now. You will become a Jedi, I promise.
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET

text: There is no doubt. The mysterious warrior was a Sith.
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET

text: Always two there are....no more...no less. A maste and an apprentice.
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET

text: But which one was destroyed, the master or the apprentice?
where: EXT. THEED - CENTRAL PLAZA - FUNERAL TEMPLE STEPS - SUNSET
